---
title: Broadcast Request
---

import { RunnableCode } from "@site/src/components/RunnableCode";

<RunnableCode>

<!-- embedme ../../build-examples/broadcast-request.beacon.ts -->

```ts
import { DAppClient } from "@airgap/beacon-sdk";

// Create a new DAppClient instance
const dAppClient = new DAppClient({ name: 'Beacon Docs' })

const response = await dAppClient.requestBroadcast({
    // a valid, forged and signed transaction
    signedTransaction:
        ''
})

console.log('transaction hash', response.transactionHash)
```
